name: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE of Gary L. BRODER.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE of Gary L. BRODER.
casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE of Gary L. BRODER.
No. D-2917.
Supreme Court of the United States
Aug. 8, 2016.
Gary L. Broder, of Waterbury, Connecticut, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
